Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Mesek Thoobaal Jaadhigalin Thalaimaiyaana Adhipadhiyaagiya Maagogu Dhesaththaanaana Kogukku Edhiraaga Nee Un Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avanukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu,
3 sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar, Mesek Thoobaal Jaadhigalin Adhipadhiyaagiya Koge, Idho, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Varuven.

4 naan Unnaith Thiruppi, Un Vaayil Thuradugalaip Pottu, Unnaiyum Unnudaiya Ellaa Senaiyaiyum, Kudhiraigalaiyum, Sarvaayudhandhariththa Kudhiraiveerargalaiyum, Parisaiyum Kedagamumudaiya Thiralaana Koottaththaiyum Purappadappannuven; Avargal Ellaarum Pattayangalaip Pidiththiruppaargal.
5 avargalodekooda Persiyarum, Eththiyoppiyarum, Leebiyarum Iruppaargal; Avargalellaarum Kedagampidiththu, Thalaichcheeraavun Thariththiruppavargal.
6 komerum Avanudaiya Ellaa Raanuvangalum Vadathisaiyilulla Thogarmaa Vamsaththaarum Avargaludaiya Ellaa Raanuvangalumaagiya Thiralaana Janangal Unnudanekooda Iruppaargal.
7 nee Aayaththappadu, Unnudanekoodina Un Ellaak Koottaththaiyum Aayaththappaduththu; Nee Avargalukkuk Kaavalaalanaayiru.

8 anega Naatkalukkup Pirpaadu Nee Visaarikkappaduvaai; Pattayaththukku Neengalaagi, Parpala Janangalirundhu Serththukkollappattu Vandhavargalin Dhesaththil Kadaisi Varushangalile Varuvaai; Nedunaal Paazhaaikkidandhu, Pirpaadu Jaadhigalilirundhu Konduvarappattavargal Ellaarum Sugaththode Kudiyirukkum Isravelin Malaigalukku Virodhamaai Varuvaai; Avargal Ellaarum Anjaamal Kudiyirukkumpodhu,
9 perunkaatraippol Ezhumbi Varuvaai; Neeyum Unnudaiya Ellaa Raanuvangalum Unnodekooda Irukkum Thiralaana Janangalum Kaarmegampol Dhesaththai Mooduveergal.

10 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal Annaalile Paazhaaikkidandhu Thirumbak Kudiyetrappatta Sthalangalukku Virodhamaagavum, Jaadhigalidaththilirundhu Serkkappattadhum, Aadugalaiyum Maadugalaiyum Aasthigalaiyum Sambaadhiththu, Dhesaththin Naduvil Kudiyirukkiradhumaana Janaththukku Virodhamaagavum, Nee Un Kaiyaith Thiruppumpadikku,
11 un Irudhayaththil Yosanaigal Ezhumba, Nee Pollaadha Ninaivai Ninaiththu,

12 naan Kollaiyidavum Sooraiyaadavum, Madhilgalillaamal Kidakkira Graamangalulla Dhesaththukku Virodhamaaip Poven; Nirvisaaramaai Sugaththode Kudiyirukkiravargalinmel Varuven; Avargal Ellaarum Madhilgalillaamal Kudiyirukkiraargal; Avargalukkuth Thaazhppaalum Illai, Kadhavugalum Illai Enbaai.

13 sebaa Dhesaththaarum, Thedhaan Dhesaththaarum, Tharsheesin Varththagarum Adhinudaiya Paalasingangalaana Anaivarum Unnai Nokki: Nee Kollaiyida Allavo Varugiraayendrum, Nee Sooraiyaadi, Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Aasthiyaiyum Eduththukkollugiradharkum, Aadugalaiyum Maadugalaiyum Pidikkiradharkum, Migavum Kollaiyidugiradharkum Allavo Unnudaiya Koottaththaik Koottinaayendrum Solluvaargal.

14 aagaiyaal Manupuththirane, Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Kogai Nokki Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar; En Janamaagiya Isravel Sugamaaik Kudiyirukkira Akkaalaththile Nee Adhai Arivaai Allavo?

15 appozhudhu Neeyum Unnudanekoodath Thiralaana Janangalum Vadathisaiyilulla Un Sthaanaththilirundhu Varuveergal; Avargal Periya Koottamum Thiralaana Senaiyumaayirundhu, Ellaarum Kudhiraigalinmel Erugiravargalaayiruppaargal.

16 nee Dhesaththaik Kaarmegampol Mooda, En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Virodhamaaga Ezhumbivaruvaai; Kadaisinaatkalile Idhu Sambavikkum; Koge, Jaadhigalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Unmoolamaai Naan Parisuththar Endru Vilangappadugiradhinaal Avargal Ennai Ariyumpadikku Unnai Endhesaththukku Virodhamaaga Varappannuven.

17 unnai Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Varappannuven Endru Poorvanaatkalile Anega Varushakaalamaaith Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu, Isravelin Theerkkadharisigalaagiya En Oozhiyakkaararaikkondu, Annaatkalile Naan Kuriththuchchonnavan Nee Allavo Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
18 isravel Dhesaththukku Virodhamaaga Kogu Varumkaalaththil En Ukkiram En Naasiyil Erumendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
19 annaalile Isravel Dhesaththile Periya Adhirchchi Undaagi,

20 en Prasannaththinaal Samuththiraththu Machchangalum, Aagaayaththupparavaigalum, Veliyin Mirugangalum, Tharaiyil Oorugira Sagala Praanigalum, Dhesamengumulla Sagala Narajeevangalum Adhirum; Parvadhangal Idiyum; Senguththaanavaigal Vizhum; Ellaa Madhilgalum Tharaiyile Vizhundhupom Endru En Erichchalinaalum En Sinaththin Akkiniyinaalum Nichchayamaai Sollugiren.
21 en Ellaa Malaigalilum Pattayaththai Avanukku Virodhamaaga Varavazhaippen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Avanavan Pattayam Avan Sagodharanukku Virodhamaayirukkum.

22 kollainoyinaalum Raththam Sindhudhalinaalum Naan Avanode Vazhakkaadi, Avanmelum Avan Raanuvangalinmelum Avanodirukkum Thiralaana Janangalinmelum Vellamaai Adikkum Mazhaiyaiyum, Perunkalmazhaiyaiyum, Akkiniyaiyum, Kandhagaththaiyum Varushikkappannuven.
23 ivvidhamaai Naan Anega Jaadhigalin Kangalukku Munbaaga En Magaththuvaththaiyum En Parisuththaththaiyum Vilangappanni, Ariyappaduven; Appozhudhu Naankarththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
